value.title: Generation and evaluation of artificial mental health records for Natural Language Processing
value.excerpt: A serious obstacle to the development of Natural Language Processing (NLP) methods in the clinical domain is the accessibility of textual data. The mental health domain is particularly challenging, partly because clinical documentation relies heavily on free text that is difficult to de-identify completely.
